# useSyncedStyles() function

React hook. Optimal CSS markup for virtual scroll is not intuitive. Use this hook to avoid unneeded boilerplate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useSyncedStyles: (model: VirtualScroller) => [(outerRef: HTMLElement | null) => void, (innerRef: HTMLElement | null) => void]
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

model


</td><td>

[VirtualScroller](./virtual-core.virtualscroller.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

\[(outerRef: HTMLElement \| null) =&gt; void, (innerRef: HTMLElement \| null) =&gt; void\]

Array of two callback refs (for outer and inner elements).

## Remarks

An example could be found [here](https://af-utils.vercel.app/virtual/examples/react/hook/simple)
